channel.description: Recent content in Frontend on AWS System Manager

item.title: 4.1. Tạo S3 bucket cho FE
item.description: Bật Static website hosting: > Áp bucket policy (demo public-read) > { "Version": "2012-10-17", "Statement": [ { "Sid": "PublicReadGetObject", "Effect": "Allow", "Principal": "*", "Action": ["s3:GetObject"], "Resource": ["arn:aws:s3:::BUCKET_NAME/*"] } ] }

item.title: 4.2. Sửa CORS ở backend
item.description: Thêm vào /etc/sysconfig/be.env trên EC2: SPRING_MVC_CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://<S3_WEBSITE_URL> SPRING_MVC_CORS_ALLOWED_METHODS=GET,POST,PUT,DELETE,OPTIONS SPRING_MVC_CORS_ALLOWED_HEADERS=* SPRING_MVC_CORS_ALLOW_CREDENTIALS=true
